questions.question: How happy are you with the Survey Maker plugin?
Please provide your feature suggestion in the box below. All suggestions are welcomed!
Have you ever contacted our customer support service?
If yes, how helpful do you find our customer support service?
Do you know about 30 days of money-back guarantee?
Please provide your email address. We will contact you for further discussion and provide a solution that makes you smile :)
